items.description: SaaS that automates Scope 3 data collection and carbon accounting for mid-market ($50Mâ€“$500M revenue). Integrate with Climate TRACE, supply chain data. Target: manufacturing, retail, logistics.

items.name: FDA AI compliance platform for digital health
items.why_now: FDA Jan 2025 draft guidance; comment April 7. 1000+ AI devices authorized; lifecycle + postmarket monitoring required. No vertical SaaS for FDA AI compliance.
items.description: B2B platform for health tech: design controls, bias documentation, postmarket monitoring for AI-enabled devices. Target: digital health startups pre-510(k).

items.name: Voluntary carbon credit integrity layer
items.why_now: VCM $535M 2024 (down from $2.1B); GAO limited federal role; Oxford framework for regulation. Credibility gap creates demand for verification/ratings.
items.description: API or platform that rates/verifies voluntary carbon projects against Oxford-style criteria. Sell to corporates, insurers, registries.
